name: Crop Top Clothing
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras (Recommended for best quality, you may try other samplers)

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 10

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.3-0.7.

  • Keys: wearing crop_top_clothing, visible_belly

Very simple to use, just use the keyword.

One thing i have to say, is that SD already understands crop top dresses (with visible belly) but it doesn't understand crop top in combo with another LoRA clothing, so this model is made mostly to be used in combo with other LoRAs as i did in my prompts, for example with spiderwoman costume model or with kimono model. You will then generate that dress with a crop in the belly that will be visible.

It usually works with the main keyword wearing crop_top_clothing, might need a weight like 1.3 as i did in my prompts. But if it's not enough you can use both keywords and add visible_belly yo tour prompt to have a stronger effect.

It also works with anime, most of the times.

Enjoy!

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians

meta.prompt:
